jade.core
Interface ServiceHelper

public interface ServiceHelper

This interface is implemented by all the service helper classes, i.e. SecurityHelper, etc... Agents get their service helper by the method: Agent.getHelper(String)

See Also:
Agent.getHelper(java.lang.String)
